long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Momento - YouTube Timestamp Saver

A simple way to save, manage, and share timestamps in YouTube videos. Perfect for students, researchers, content creators, and anyone who needs to track important moments in any YouTube content.

Key Features:
- Video Timestamp Support
  - Save timestamps during videos, live streams, and premieres
- Custom Labels
  - Organize timestamps with custom descriptions, edit or delete them anytime
- One-Click Sharing
  - Easy copy timestamp URL to share specific video moments
- Data Management
  - Export and import your timestamps, all data stays in your browser
  - Merge multiple timestamp collections

How to Use:
- Open any YouTube video 
- Click the extension icon to open the popup
- Click "Add Timestamp" to save the current time
- Click any timestamp to jump to that moment
- Use the share button to copy a direct link to any timestamp

Privacy First:
- No account required
- All data stored locally in your browser
- No tracking or analytics
- No external services used

Questions or feedback? Contact us at uziscode@gmail.com
